course_name = #{courseName},
teacher_id = #{teacherId},
course_status = #{courseStatus},
introduction = #{introduction},
course_start_time = #{courseStartTime},
course_end_time = #{courseEndTime},

mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, nick_name, phonenumber, sys_user.email, sys_dept.dept_name AS class_name, parent_dept.dept_name AS collage_name FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_dept ON sys_user.dept_id = sys_dept.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS parent_dept ON sys_dept.parent_id = parent_dept.dept_id WHERE user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM business_user_and_course_relation WHERE course_id = #{courseId} )
